meanings.definition: The act of making something ugly.
meanings.sent1: The uglification of the old building was evident after the graffiti was sprayed on its walls.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting underwent an uglification process when he accidentally spilled paint on it.
meanings.sent3: The uglification of the cake happened when the icing melted and dripped off in a messy way.
meanings.sent4: The garden gnome's sudden uglification was like a beautiful flower wilting in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The uglification of the room was so drastic that even the furniture seemed to frown in disapproval.

meanings.sent1: The slow uglification of the once vibrant flower saddened the gardener.
meanings.sent2: The uglification of the landscape was gradual, but noticeable over time.
meanings.sent3: The sudden uglification of the puppy's fur made it look like a little monster.
meanings.sent4: The uglification of the city skyline was like watching a beautiful sunset turn into a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The uglification of the building was so extreme that even the pigeons avoided perching on its ledges.
